content: is also included use the written instructions for starting each piece so your stitch count is correct if you feel the stitch count is wrong in the written instructions count the stitches using the chart enjoy square - make 9 row 1 using white chain chain 41 single_crochet single_crochet row 5 repeat row 3 in 3rd chain from hook then another single_crochet x38 for a total of 39 stitches chain 1 and turn for new row 6 skip ps single_crochet cc to taupe ps single_crochet x13 ps single_crochet row cc to white ps single_crochet cc to sand ps single_crochet x13 ps single_crochet cc to white ps single_crochet x2 chain 1 turn row 2 skip ps single_crochet x18 ps single_crochet x2 chain 1 turn you should have a total of 19 popcorns row 7 repeat row 3 row 3 skip single_crochet x2 cc to sand single_crochet x16 cc to white single_crochet row 8 skip ps single_crochet cc to taupe ps single_crochet x3 ps single_crochet x2 cc to taupe single_crochet x16 cc to white single_crochet x3
